case.state: Hi there! I’m Ping. This is where the game’s being played, right?
Hi. I'm... Ping! Let's uh... let's get down to business, shall we?
Hm. That's a good question, Misty. Perhaps you should undress first?
Xia are often androgynous, Sayaka. Gender confusion is... quite a typical turn of events in such tales.
Research...? What kind of research?
Huh… An anonymous girl… she seems… familiar.
Well, hello there hand-- full of competition. Let's make this a good one, Mr...?
I think you mentioned you're a mermaid, Misty? I actually know another mermaid with red hair!
A spirit guide? Hm. I'm used to Mushu... but Navi seems like she'd be helpful here.
Hm. It seems odd to bring help to a game like this... can't you take care of yourself, Remilia?
Hm... that's quite the outfit, Sheena. Befitting of xia, even.
What sort of dark pact have you made, ~player~?
You know, this seems like a pretty public place... but I guess it's easy to get street food...
I’ve played a lot of cards when we were snowed in near the Tung Shao Pass. This’ll be easier than dumplings.
Nothing manlier than getting naked and gambling…
I’d prefer mahjong…
Give me ~cards~, dealer.
Bah, ~cards~.
This’s much easier without all my armor. ~cards~.
Just ~cards~.
~cards~ for me.
I could use a few more. ~cards~.
~cards~... don’t dishonor me.
Tsk. ~cards~.
PH Loss
Wonderful. When I wasn’t marching or training, I played a lot of cards. Doesn’t seem to help too much now though…
Oh, this hand’s worse than three day old rice.
Oh noooo, this hand is awful. (I wonder if they realize I'm bluffing?)
A pair in hand is worth two in the bush. Mine, by the way, I’m not going to be showing you… yet.
I don’t really need any more tricks to win. But what if I am bluffing?
Lucky cricket or no, this is a most fortunate hand.
I like to make my own luck. Though, I do like red, obviously.
I can’t tell if the rest of you are distracted, or if I’m just having a good set of hands.
Ugh, I should rip these cards in half, to show off how tough I am, or something equally obnoxious or distracting.
Want to arm wrestle instead? I’m a lot more confident in that than these. Come on, look at me, surely one of you big, strong folks can take me…?
Dishonor on this hand. Teehee. I know that’s more of a giggle than a deep chuckle, but I had to say it at least once!
You may as well give up now. This hand’s unstoppable.
See, everyone? Play with honor, and you might get a hand as good as mine.
Not bad. Pretty good, even.
Now this is fun. Don’t just make me wonder, show me what the rest of you got!
Now, wait a second. Red is supposed to be lucky. But this hand's hardly got anything good in it...
This'll do.
Oh, you're all in for it now!
Reflect before you act. This shall bring you glory and honor.
Feh.
I’m not liable to win, but I’m not just going to be distressed if it comes to that.
One lie deserves another, I suppose. Want to guess if this hand’s amazing and I’m bluffing that it isn’t?
Can’t beat these cards.
You’re all about to get whupped. If you don’t take a risk now, it’ll cost you...
(Hm. I wonder if they can tell I'm bluffing?) Yep, this hand is incredible. Not at all bad.
Honor’s very important. So, I’ll go ahead and admit this hand’s pretty much slop.
Tsk. And here I was, thinking myself so clever. I can fold, right? This hand, I mean. Obviously, any civilized person can do their own laundry...
Well, at least I have nothing left to hide. Except my body. That I can hide.
I’m thankful that at least my ancestors aren’t watching me. That would be very… odd. I wouldn’t want their favor in this type of event.
Honor is a stronger force than steel. So, it seems I won’t steal victory here.
Folks, what things do you look for in a match? For me: a person who speaks their mind, and is brave, clever, and most importantly: honorable.
Oh. You can call me Mulan, now. Ping’s just a made up name. Honesty is a virtue, though, judging by how good this hand is.

L'Arachel, for that second part of our bet... If you do lose the match, I want you to be very vocal about your fantasies about ~player~. And me, if it strikes you to be a good, honorable loser of her word.
Well, 9S? Aren't you programmed to help humans? What's your answer?
I'm sure I'm not the only one curious about that, Akko.
Well, Ann?
Now's definitely not the time to be silent, cool type, Coco.
You lost, D.Va. Be a good princess and answer.
Well, I'm certainly very curious, Futaba.
Well, Spider-Woman? What do you have for us?
Well, that's lovely, Haru! I'm impressed you'd enjoy yourself to that degree!
Hmm... I wonder, Kizuna.
I'm always interested to see someone with an ego brought low. Just be honest with all your feelings, no matter how visceral, L'Arachel.
Well, Lotte? Is that where you find inspiration for your "Fanfic"?
I see, Mae... that's... not honestly what I was expecting!
Well, Ladybug? It's not like I asked something particularly intimate...
O-oh. Is that so, McCree?
Don't forget, Mia. I still want my answer!
Well, miss Tojiko, it seems you have quite a challenge of your own for your spouse.
It sound like your next boyfriend is in for a treat, Misty.
Come on, Natsuki! ~player~'s right here!
Don't forget to answer my question, Pit. Or I'll pluck you like a chicken.
I see, Ryuji... I... apologize for the question.
I see, Saki. Well... should ~player~ not be interested tonight...
Well, Sayaka? Tell us.
Well, Sei how you feel, Sei!
You lost fair and square, Princess. Let's hear what you have to say for yourself.
I see! I can hold my liquor, but that's truly impressive, Syrenne.
Surely something pleasant's happened to you?
Come on, Natsuki. ~player~'s right there!
Well, "Uravity?" This one's pretty easy. I don't want to embarrass you further.
Post's waiting for you, ~player~!
...you could say that, Ini. Between battles, the army would stop at brothels. I think the working ladies were surprised by me. But, I was surprised how much fun I had with them.
Hm... I'm not much of a driver... anything without reins or handlebars is a bit beyond my skillset. Though I'm quite a marksman, should you need fusiliers!
Are men or women better... I prefer men, because they feel more... creative. But I think women tend to be more consistent. If you want to finish, I'd say women are more predictable. But, men are fun.
Oh, I've gotten drunk far, far more often as Ping than as Mulan. It's... not a terribly hard charade to keep up, though it did make the sex rather much of an acquired joy.
I can't believe I lost my own bet!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
You lost, so answer honestly!
Sounds like a lovely experience, Jessie.
(Princess! Yeah, you! Don't tell if I don't!)
What's... Fapping? I think it's a joke at my expense. You know, Fa Ping.

state.text: It does seem odd to leave them just sitting there...

case.state: Szechuan beef sounds great, heavy on the sauce, please.
It's simply a fun wager. If you're not up for a little banter... that's fine, I just didn't take you as the type to back down.
It's fun to gamble. Gambling while gambling is also appealing, wouldn't you say? Plus, I have so much to ask you.
Pardon me, Croix. Those cubes... can't shape themselves into some sort of tide of mechanical robots, or something, can they?
Just a suggestion, but perhaps you should... sample yourself, Misty. I imagine I'd-- ~player~'d be quite enticed by that...
For a mercenary, you're making poor tactical decisions.
I'm sure I can make it up to you, Syrenne. And I do mean that. Honesty's quite the virtue, after all.
You can act as you like, Croix. Isn't this a game dedicated to foreplay, anyway?
Have you heard of Green Destiny, Jin? Your blade reminds me of that tale.
Those panties are actually quite beautiful. Lacy... but not see through. You truly prefer the best goods you can find? I can only imagine how soft and gentle those must be...
It takes all types, Mae. But I see you as a... roughly human catgirl? Blue fur... which I assume's your hair? Pair of ears. They're a lot easier to read as tells when you have a bad hand!
Mae, I'm serious. Find some water, and sing a song. That helps most girls I know. Really. No zen wisdom. Just practical advice.
Your consort isn't of the Earth? How interesting! I wonder what other surprise you have for us, Crown Prince.
I'm just shocked that someone would conceal their identity in a game like this!
Sakura... that means... cherry blossom, right? Fitting someone so... pink!
Though, I'm sure I could make some fireworks fly if you and I got together after the game, Sheena.
How're you when it comes to ghost-fighting and repelling barbarian hordes, Syrenne? What about rescuing princesses?
Tsk. There are ladies present. Not me, and definitely not Syrenne, but be polite, won't you?
I know that look... you thinking what I'm thinking, Syrenne?
Your bush is two-toned! How exotic!
~player~, she seems... durable. Let's hope she can match her own expectations, huh?
I might fit in rather well in your House, Lady Bernadetta. I'll have you know my underwear isn't so different from yours.
Well, as you can see, we match a bit. If you want, I can be your retainer on a more regular basis, Lady Bernadetta.
It occurs to me to ask... are you cursed to be a statue...?
Flattery will get you just about everywhere, Princess.
A pleasure to meet you as well, little witch!
...Wise, Rin.
Oh dear... I should talk to Megaera... she's a little more familiar with Greek statues. That is your design, isn't it, Miss Galatea?
There's quite a few people here tonight... I'd take her up on that if I were you, ~player~.
I see. I can carry a tune myself. I don't suppose you'd like to teach me your melodies, Lotte?
Apology accepted. I know you're almost finished, but shouldn't you wait and see if... uh, my anatomy is up to the task of taking care of you.
...Ah. I see. I have... a... uh, story about something similar.
That's the spirit, Emi!
I think I'll let you two have your moment, Ribbon Girl. I have my own challenge, after all!
Hm... I was going to issue a similar challenge... but mine was more of a truth than a dare. Let's see what you and ~player~ get up to, hmm?
I had imagined you were wearing armor... but it's excellent you're still pursuing your passions!
I'm sure you have, uh, many exciting stories to share with us, Lotte!

condition.saying: And you made a promise to me.

case.state: Are you sure it wasn't just a dream, Tharja...? (I'm no stranger to evil sorcerers. Time to play the good prince tonight.)
You know, you may as well share those treasures, Tharja...
Romantic, but... you sure that wasn't just a dream? ~player~'s not the talkative type, it seems.
...That's... almost touching. But you do realize ~player~'s got to want it too, right?

condition.saying: I want to make the same promise to you

case.state: Something tells me that ~player~'s not getting as much out of this as you are, Tharja!
I have to ask: Who wore her disguise better... me or Sakura? You can be honest if I was the winner.
I'm sorry, N. I didn't realize it was such a touchy subject... But... they teach you a lesson in how not to be cruel to others, yes? And durable in the face of cruelty?
I know he's not exactly the manliest, but I know I'd be offended if you called me a woman, Pinkie. There's at least two men here. Of which one is me. Ping.
A prince? Don't worry, Miko. I'll keep you safe tonight. No need to be a frightened little boy.
He can be a little... frustrating. But I certainly don't hate Mushu. Why do you hate your guardian spirits, Chazz?
While it's nice to have friends to lean on, I'm no stranger to fighting my own battles. Come, Ribbon Girl!
I'm flattered, Pinkie, but I'm a man. I don't plan on losing, but let's show you what I've got!
Hm. I suppose you have a point. The Land of Dragons is... quite similar to Earth, though.
I guess you have a point... but I think taking something off your body is different than putting something on. Tell me, isn't it rougher on you without hair?
A little derivative, don't you think, D.Va? I did pave the way for girls like you, though. I'll accept your bet, as long as you accept mine.
I guess not. But, it wouldn't be fun if I didn't get to, Jessie.
I'm a woman who's very good at getting what she wants, despite obstacles in her way, Jessie. Why don't you tell me?
My... greatest fear, Megumin? I... suppose dishonoring the people who rely on me. I may enjoy myself, but the last thing I would wish to do is shame those around me.
My favorite... animal? You didn't need to see me naked to ask that, Megumin! I like tigers. Though I do have a noble horse. Do you want to ask another question?
Adventures? I suppose journeying across the Land of Dragons to save the Emperor from Shan Yu counts, huh?
Books... hm... I'm actually quite well-read! I like poetry, and philosophy, mostly, Aella.
Oh, D.Va? Are you sure you can keep up? I accept your challenge.
I like anything with singing! I know that's simple, but I far prefer it to instruments or poetry.
The Tung Shao pass, near the Great Wall, has a beautiful snowscape and numerous cozy villages, Meia. I'd start there.
Women from the Land of Dragons don't usually groom there. Some do elsewhere, but... what's wrong with what's natural?
Phallic means... it looks somewhat like a penis!
Meia! If you're looking for things to do on Earth, I think you'd love the Zhangjiajie. They're beautiful rock formations, and the site of many famous duels! Plus, quite phallic.
Quite the story, Miko! Now, back to the game then, huh? I suppose I could tell you of my history, though...
Oh? Do they serve food here, Pit? I'd like eggs and pork belly over rice. Um. Arranged like a smiley face.
A buff burly guy like only drinks the hard stuff! Like… the hardest liquor you have, Dealer!
Well, Sei, shall we say that a philosopher says that what one does in the army, one may come to enjoy? About what was gifted to all people, not just half?
You know, this is the part you're supposed to sing, Tharja. No? Let's get to the next hand then, shall we?
It's fine to be comfortable with whatever body you have. But I think... most people like to be private about their own.
I guess when you're particularly skilled, you become known only as the master of your art. Right, Trainer?
I've done lots of conditioning and martial arts, Ms. Trainer. Any extra tips or suggestions based on my physique?
Well, Hanako?
Feel free to answer, Ini.
I see! Well, I'm sure you're in for a lovely surprise while you stay on Earth, Meia.
Hm... I'm not sure I expected that answer, but... you also seem like a woman who can tolerate mystery.
Hm... not quite what I was expecting, but... still sounds lovely, Sakura.
I'll take you up on that drink, Sei. Can I have that "Mulan Tea," if you'd be so kind? It sounds wonderful.
Come now, Streaming-chan. Surely you can think of something?

W-well, I usually need to get a ride from one of the other Princesses or this boy with a magic key. I don't really understand it, there's a mouse... it's all very strange. Best left a mystery, really.
Well, Akko, most magic in my world tends to be pretty small things. Nothing like what you use. Mostly spirits and monsters, rather than fireballs and transforming.
Coco, my parents were... the jokes persisted for a while, but it let me accomplish so much, they were rather unbothered.
Well, no, Futaba. I did it... well, for a lot of reasons. That may have been a small one. Very small. Quite small.
No, it's pretty easy to fill in generic cases, and obviously I can react directly to targeted lines. I do think trap support is a ways off, but for now you can be clever, right, Ms. Ai?

To answer Lotte's question... A concubine of a magistrate gifted me a very satisfying implement of pure jade after I rescued her from bandits. It's... quite decadent to masturbate with something so valuable.
Zombie apocalypse, Mae...? Oh, that's so easy! Mushu for fire and humor, my sword for the undying, a map... Good shoes... very important. Aaand... probably at least one companion!
I'm sorry, Marinette. I don't know anything about that. If it's a consolation, if I find out, I'd be happy to help you.
Famous... samurai? Hm... No. The heroic warriors of my land are called "xia," which is something like a travelling knight.
Miko, it does feel empowering. But... there's lots of pragmatics. Of all people, you'd understand that it can be both, can't you?
18 Types... hm... I rather enjoy Wood and Metal... so perhaps Grass/Metal would be my trainer focus. Though, I do have a dragon, a horse, and a criket...
I fought a powerful warlord named Shan-yu, Pit. His Horde tried to destroy my capital! After a long duel, my wits overwhelmed him, and I took home his sword as a trophy.
"Hide the dragon...?" If you exclude the lovely ladies in the brothels... perhaps a dozen, over a few years? My favorite was doing the hiding, Miss Saki.
I'll make sure to tell everyone about the fantastic group of zombie princesses, Sakura. I'm sure they'd be happy to support you!
My master's weakspot... Hmm... Well, the man who taught me has a really soft neck... and earlobes...
Well, from behind, yes, Sei, it has. Or at a brothel, you'd be surprised. I've had many pleasant encounters.
I... was in the army. I see no appeal in such a vulgar... gangbang. I may appreciate my body, but I don't... no, Nicole. I've answered, may we move on?
If I could have any power...? Honestly, I've often prayed to my ancestors to led me lead my allies from within their spirits. Something to inspire morale at a thought would be very useful!
Ah. Yes. Of course, Jessie. Most men have that issue.
Have I ever caught myself getting chubby...? Honestly, no. I'm on the move constantly and watch what I eat... but perhaps I could indulge a little more... nobody wants just skin and bones.
Hm... that's an interesting workout routine, Erufuda!
I see! I enjoy that one a lot myself.
To answer your question, Jessie... alcohol, darkness, and a... rather increasing enjoyment for a certain very male form of penetration, when unavoidable.
That sounds rather lovely, Megumin. I wish you luck with that special someone.
I guess you could say that. My only superpower seems to be a strong will and some good luck, though, Starfire. The sex parts are nice.
A-are small... Are small breasts truly such an issue?
A person who hates nature... Is a person who dislikes themselves. Not really a valid partner...

Well, if you want a strapping warrior, you gotta be smart! Uh, being pretty goes pretty far. But really, you gotta be smart and kind. The most attractive thing about a person is her brain, you know? Be clever and determined.
I'm surprised to see a trainer here. I'm open to new lessons, Ms...?
Family's everything. Protecting the people you love and that raised you is the most important thing imaginable, don't you?
W-what're you talking about? Of course you shouldn't lie. Unless telling the truth is worse. Or gets someone hurt.
The truth is important... but why reveal everything about one person at one time. The truth is such an elusive thing.
Dark secrets? Like what? I don't like what you're implying, Jessie. I don't need to justify myself to you. Excuse me.
Well... as far as dark secrets go, I think the big one's out of the way. I also have a guardian spirit that's a dragon, believe it or not.
I... why would I have an issue with someone's passtimes, even smoking? Life's too short to condemn people for such a simple vice.
I'm... always a little curious about currency. If I had a million gold coins, I suppose I'd spend it building a college for women to learn the arts of war and statecraft.
As long as that mistake isn't hurting other people... you know what they say, don't you? The past is history, the future's a mystery, and the present's a gift.
I'm... far more used to the lights being off. But... I would love to share experiences in the light...
Of course not, Jessie. That would be breaking someone's trust, and that's wrong. You have to let people make choices.
Among xia... love can be tragic. I think I'd be a fool to fall in love and curse someone to an untimely death... even if I'd really prefer they stay loyal...
I suppose as little as possible. If a woman has an urge, why wouldn't she want someone to... fill it?
Most... erotic works in my world tend to be drawn or written. I keep a collection of my favorites as I journey between towns. But... perhaps weekly?
...More than once a day? I'm no stranger to drills and training, but isn't that a bit much? Even at the height of passion, more than twice is asking a lot!
I enjoy reverse raider. You know, when the woman's on top but there's ample room for the man to... grab her from behind?
Do you mean...? Well... when one's a man, it's something you learn to enjoy, at least for other men, right?
Well... it's something I've had quite a bit of time to get used to. I enjoy it, but I'd prefer the typical anatomy, all being equal.
Are you so sure about that, Weiss? I can be pretty convincing, if I do say so myself...
Huh? What do you mean there’s all girls here? I’m a spittin’ hack image of masculinity and bravado right here, ladies.
Pfft, I know it’s hard to believe that it’s four lovely ladies and a formidable soldier like me, but don’t get confused: I’m very much a boy. Man. Guy.
Let's make this interesting. If one of you is the first naked, you reveal a secret. But if you get me naked first, I’ll answer a question from each of you. Fair?
I came here looking for a challenge, but is this the best anyone can do?
Are you sure about that, Coco?
Why thank you! I really liked your costume. I think I've seen sweaters with that pink/white design. I'm not really one for helmets, though.
A Pegasus Knight? Uh, I can get my horse, Khan, to go pretty fast... but... I don't know what a Pegasus Knight is...
Kind of rude to assume I'm just based entirely on some logic structure, Kizuna.
I don’t dislike it, but it’s mostly practical.
I think it’s possible to be a good spouse and keep doing what you love…
I don’t think we really want to talk about that--
I’m not a princess by birth or by marriage, but I supposed you could say I’m part of an Order of princesses, or something like that.
I’m not the best one I’ve met...but I’m pretty good.
There will always be those who don’t deserve their authority.
No. That also translates pretty weirdly…
The duel at Yaoguai Falls… the Siege of Storybrooke…
Please find a more polite way to phrase that…
Why, yes! I would say I’m a xia, but not quite a wanderer. I fight to protect my home, after all.
It's somewhat of a long story... the short version is that women weren't allowed in the Army, and... one moment.
And here I was, worried all that manliness was an act.
My father, of course. He was injured may years before, and for him to fight again would have been a death sentence...
My mother told me that he was worried I'd be killed, and felt tremendously ashamed.
Hm... I just think that any good story needs the hero to keep going. And if you're not the hero of your own story, why bother?
Of course it's a man's name, Cammy. Because I am a manly, manly man.
I'll have you know I'm quite skilled, Kamina. We should spar!
Clearly, Misato is distracted by my manly charms, or she wouldn't be looking my way.
It's never a bad thing to come prepared, right? Especially when you don't know the crowd. As for zombies... I can't say I'm familiar. That's more Tiana's... uh, experience.
This is the ancestral armor of the Fa clan, Syrenne. I came equipped for a battle... though perhaps this would be more of a battle of wits!
Well, funny you should mention manly things...
Well, there is a saying about the clarity of drink-- but-- yes, I...
I wouldn't dream of it. I'll even keep my sword about me.
Caution and daring in equal measure a proud warrior make, L'Arachel. I'll keep my sword for now.
They're... honestly just day to day clothes. That happened to be at the Emperor's Palace. And were my size... such questions aren't worth dwelling on, right?
Is that so, Syrenne? I find the disguise less effective against one who's so... practiced in seeing other women xia in armor.
And that would be what, L'Arachel?
I'd hope it makes up for my lack of other thrusting implements, Syrenne.
It's my family's ancestral blade. Not thinking lewd thoughts, are you, Kamina?
Pride is for one's family. Honor is for all, L'Arachel.
It's... certainly a real soldier's uniform. Because I am a real soldier.
Thanks, Jessie. Truth be told, I feel exactly the same way.
I can't imagine what you mean, Panty.
It is rather much a big distraction, so... ah, forget it.
...Are you insisting on keeping this up, Panty?
You know, few people ever bother to ask that. The practical reason is that there just are simply very few men here.
Why... er... thank you?
What are you talking about, Amy?
...What else of my appearance is going to be challenged tonight?
Oh, yes, please, do comment on my appearance, while yours is stained with inks of low reputation!
Well... my wraps aren't as supportive as Ms. Trainer's bra, so they're at least a little more comfortable to get out of...
Spits. Calling me a woman because I lost one hand? Aren’t you a forward-minded bunch. Clearly, I’m a big strong man with my sword and my armor.
I’m shocked you all figured it out so fast. That costume’s fooled… well, probably a lot more people than it ought to.
I’m no Captain Shang. I’m not going to be whipping you into shape, but I hope you realize that I’m winning, and that motivates you to assess yourselves.
I really liked how I was playing. Didn’t you? Time for something small that ends up showing quite a bit...
Not to brag, but if this is your best… maybe you should train a little harder.
My robe’s getting a little stuffy. I suppose this’s been what you’ve been waiting for…

I hope it’s obvious that only a few people have actually seen me naked, but forgive me if I don’t act like a bashful girl on her wedding night. If I didn’t plan for this, why would I have shown up in full armor?
I know I’ve done quite a few bluffs and deceptions, and I apologize. But I’m being honest when I say at this stage, I’m looking forward to joining the rest of you.
What, because I don’t have facial hair, I’m a girl now? Well, I’ll show you what’s what next hand.
I know I lost the hand, but it’s rude to insult me by calling me a woman just because of it. I’ll have you know some of the best game players I know are women.
Fine, fine, let’s let me not make a big deal over a little deal, like you’re all about to.
There’s no Wei I should’ve lost that hand… but keeping up appearances forever is girly. Actually, let me just...
Dang! I thought I was doing so well! At least I have quite a few layers left. Perks of elaborate styles, I suppose.
I’ll hold onto the sword for a while longer. I’m fine with my hands, but I think you get my point better when I’m visibly armed.
I think the stuff you work for ends up being the work that’s most impressive. But, you did already get me out of my armor… and my disguise.
Hmm… I suppose you’re expecting my sword by now… don’t worry, I’m not going to do any fancy tricks with it, but I’m still not really interested in parting with it just yet.
I’m determined not to lose, but it’s enjoyable to see so much variety here. When I spend time with the other “Princesses,” it’s… a fair bit more predictable.
I concede with all the grace and honor expected of me.
While I’d rather this be in more private quarters, I suppose rules are rules… I’ll take off the leggings as well.
A dress and leggings. I hope this’s enough to smooth over any hurt feelings.
I’m not very… jiggly. Like some. You’ll find me less like a dumpling and more like a lean cut of-- you know, I’m not comparing myself to a piece of meat, and you shouldn’t either.
I’m certainly glad I opted against Belle and Anna’s advice. Corsets and the like just… ah, “push the meat to the top of the pie.” Somewhat hard to do when you’re mostly muscle.
Well, I’ve put the name of my family on the line before… but if a soldier doesn’t enjoy him or herself when off duty, how can they know when to fight important battles?
This has been quite the challenge. Well-played, but I do have one more hand at the very least… until I resort to my hand, I suppose.
I’ve got delicate features. So what? Never watched any wuxia plays? Doesn’t mean I’m a girl. And even if I was, I’d want you to treat me the same.
Huh? What’re you looking at, besides 130 pounds of pure testosterone?
Quit it with all the girl and lady comments… Feh.
And here I was, worried you’d start taking it easy on me for being a woman. I appreciate the respect!

My question should be pretty easy, ~name~: Has your hair always been like that? I know that’s not a terribly interesting question, but most of the worlds I’ve visited or heard of have exotic styles rather than colors.
My question, ~name~, for our wager: So you’re a fairy… do all fairy godmothers have needs like this, or are you just the guardian of a rather unfortunate child?
You lost the bet, ~name~! What sort of combat style to like to employ? I’m quite skilled with a sword, but I admit the roar of a canon or the explosion of gunpowder really makes my fire rage.
I would’ve imagined a professional gambler’d have done better at a game of cards. What’s your favorite game besides this? And, while I’m at it, your favorite game to play while naked?

Are those horns made out of bone, or something softer? I… can see the merits of them, provided they aren’t too sharp in fulfilling some fantasies.
You’re a minstrel of some sort, or a census-taker, right? Given how you’ve sought to record so much information today. It’s a little nice to be the one getting the attention now though, isn’t it?
You lost the bet, ~name~! Are you doing anything after this? You seem like you could use some attention, and I’d promise to be gentle…
Did you pick your outfit, ~name~, or was it given to you? I have to think something so frilly makes it quite… breezy to move around with. Do you ever imagine using your ribbons for something else?
Now that you’ve lost the challenge, are you going to start being nice, or do you want me to punish you? I’ve learned a few very persuasive tricks…

Piloting a machine is much like riding a horse… but I can’t say I’ve ever taken care of myself while riding. It seems… awful to do that to Khan. But you have a room to yourself in your mech. Do you regularly masturbate or sleep with people there?
My question, ~name~: When you tend to your patients, ~name~, is it purely clinical? I… would honor my duties, but I would certainly think about them when I’d finished tending to them.

So, ~name~, you lost! What exactly do you serve as a model for?
